amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to authorize the U.S. Forest Service to convey 3.61 acres of Forest Service Land to Dolores County, Colorado for the strict purpose of building a fire station.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Tipton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
